title: TNE Civil Incident Witness Statement Form - SUBJECT TO LEGAL PRIVILEGE

elements.name: Instruction
elements.label: Please use this form to factually state events, timelines, and observations!
elements.instruction: Take as many photos (and or videos) as you can. Make sure angle and zoom is suitable to tell a story (e.g., take a picture of the incident scene, then the equipment involved then the direct location of the incident)
